item.title: 317 server irc
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

Hello there Moparscape Community. MY friend and I “Telenim” have decided to make an IRC channel dedicated to 317 private servers.You can advertise, ask for help, even leech some code (even though people will probably flame you.) This server will only have a few rules.

//RULES\
1.No Bots at all there is a respected channel for IRC Bots.
2.Respect the operators. If you disrespect you will be banned from the channel.
3.317 Servers Only we don’t want anything else in here.

//ADVERTISING SPOTS\
Each Week we will pick out of all the 317 servers one to advertise. This private server will be advertised for 1 week in our channel for every person to see it. Another spot will be chosen by a person who solves a riddle. So let’s see who is smartest.

EDIT: REMOVED

//Riddle Question\Sunday October 11th

I make you weak at the worst of all times. I keep you safe, I keep you fine. I make your hands sweat, and your heart grow cold I visit the weak, but seldom the bold. What am I?

Thanks for Reading Hoping to see this channel get big.

Read full topic
